text: @WhiteHouse “@POTUS” dragged his ignorant butt on testing for two months, holding rallies & throwing parties & telling us it was just the flu. He was warned about COVID-19 already & said he “always knew it was a pandemic”. @realDonaldTrump is a criminally negligent liar. #COVIDー19 #Trump
